name: Watch Your Step! (Green Cheese Games)
description:
Warning: If you click out of the game once it has started, it will stop accepting keyboard input and you will need to refresh the page.  You can hold Control and use the scrollbar to resize the page is the game window is too large.  The game also may lag, in which case it would be best to simply use the Windows download below.

Kill your friends with hidden traps in this tense and exciting multiplayer platformer!  You and up to three friends will have to run through a simple level over and over, but there's a catch: you can place traps that other players cannot see from a distance.  This allows you to give them a nasty surprise by placing traps in clever locations, but it also means that you will have to be cautious yourself.  Outwit the other players and show off your platforming prowess to become the victor in this free-for-all battle!

Controls:

A/D - Move Right/Left

W - Jump

Press Space - Show Trap Placement Location

Release Space - Place Trap

Q/E - Toggle Through Traps

Esc - Quit Game

Credits: 

Programming/Design: Jacob Sharp

Art: Luke Sharp

Music: Juhani Junkala ( https://juhanijunkala.com/)
